dcterms:creator: Alexander D. Kent
dcterms:description: A remarkably rich dataset that can enable myriad research projects, consisting of anonymized, multi-device logs captured through the monitoring of servers, workstations, and network devices during 58 days of uninterrupted activity. The data includes more than 12,000 users and over 17,000 computing devices, with actions taken by a 'red team' representing insider threat attacks.
dcterms:title: Los Alamos National Laboratory Dataset
